description:
Redevelopment to provide 23 houses and 44 flats in the form of three terraces of 3-storey two, three and four bedroom houses and three 4-storey blocks of one and two-bedroom flats (one at each end of the Lowther Road frontage, the third at the western end of the Mackenzie Road frontage), together with layout of new parking areas the formation of vehicle crossovers. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  97/645/L(00)2B,4,5B,6A,7A,8A,9A,                         10A,10.1A,11A,12A,13A,14A,15A,16,                         21,22,23,24,25,27,28,29,30A,                         (D)01A, (D)02A
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
